_comment: This is the simplest possible component metadata
name: add_constant_column
title: Add Constant Column
description: Adds a column with a constant value to the input table. Demonstrates the minimal viable component pattern.
_comment_cartoEnvVars: Required but can be empty array if no env vars needed
_comment_inputs: Every component needs at least one input

inputs._comment: Table input represents upstream connection in workflow
inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table to add the column to

inputs._comment: String input for user to provide the constant value
inputs.name: constant_value
inputs.title: Constant value
inputs.description: The value to add in the new column

_comment_outputs: Components must have at least one output

outputs._comment: Output table contains result (typically input + new columns)
outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The input table with an additional constant_col column
